WorkItem.ClosedComment: recommendation is to extract URL from pls file
WorkItem.Description:
Can Naudio read this mp3 url?
http://players.creacast.com/creacast/sudtirol1a/playlist.pls



Regards
Alex

Comments.Message: NAudio does not read PLS files. They are only text files, so you would have to see what is at the end of the URLs within the PLS file. If it is MP3, or something that MediaFoundationReader could read, then you might be able to play it.

Perfect !!!
I have create a routine for extract url and it work fine.



Regards
Alex
